text: From the frog-in-boiling-water department. How long before Russian oligarchs murder a journalist in the US? A member of Congress? A US attorney? How will that chill discourse in politics? And assuming their puppet stays in office, because what Congress of either party is going to impeach a president if they might get killed for their vote, how long before social networks are as regulated as those in China? This is likely our future. Not sure we can do anything at this time to prevent it.
